      • setCommand

        public ExternalAlgorithmBuilder setCommand(java.util.List<java.lang.String> cmd)

        Set the command to run. In order to have access to the relevant files, the following strings will be substituted in command arguments:

        • {OUTPUT} — the output file name (should be delimited text).
        • {TRAIN_DATA} — the training CSV file name
        • {TEST_DATA} — the test data CSV file name
        Parameters:
        cmd - The command to run (name and arguments).
        Returns:
        The command (for chaining)

        public ExternalAlgorithmBuilder setOutputDelimiter(java.lang.String delim)

        Parameters:
